<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->
Hello everybody!
Trying to install one program, I've got stucked with installation of the `lz4` package

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install lz4
==> Installing lz4-1.9.2-lyxnahjrwx4g5bwcp3yuaeql5rzj6dl2

==> Using cached archive: /home/labuser/src/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/65/658ba6191fa44c92280d4aa2c271b0f4fbc0e34d249578dd05e50e76d0e5efcc.tar.gz
==> lz4: Executing phase: 'edit'
==> lz4: Executing phase: 'build'
==> lz4: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16' 'install' 'PREFIX=/home/labuser/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-cascadelake/gcc-9.3.0/lz4-1.9.2-lyxnahjrwx4g5bwcp3yuaeql5rzj6dl2'

           lib/xxhash.o bench.o datagen.o lz4cli.o lz4io.o -o lz4
     16    make[1]: Leaving directory '/home/labuser/tsp_output/spack-stage/spa
           ck-stage-lz4-1.9.2-lyxnahjrwx4g5bwcp3yuaeql5rzj6dl2/spack-src/progra
           ms'
     17    ==> lz4: Executing phase: 'install'
     18    ==> [2021-01-27-12:34:00.850895] 'make' '-j16' 'install' 'PREFIX=/ho
           me/labuser/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-cascadelake/gcc-9.3
           .0/lz4-1.9.2-lyxnahjrwx4g5bwcp3yuaeql5rzj6dl2'
     19    make[1]: Entering directory '/home/labuser/tsp_output/spack-stage/sp
           ack-stage-lz4-1.9.2-lyxnahjrwx4g5bwcp3yuaeql5rzj6dl2/spack-src/lib'

```

### Information on your system

Output of `spack debug report`
```
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-564-f6dd85b2b
* **Python:** 3.8.5
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-cascadelake
* **Concretizer:** original
```

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5879185/spack-build-env.txt)
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5879186/spack-build-out.txt)

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [ ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate

Thanks for any help in advance!
title: Installation issue: lz4
